name: Gnome Tower (Phildo)
description:
The Multiplayer VR Voxel Colony Sim

To play single player: open gnomes.exe, hit Host Server

To host server for others: run gnomes-server.exe OR hit Host Server from gnomes.exe, then set up port forwarding on your router, and forward port 54000 to your computer's local IP.

To join server: open gnomes.exe, hit Join Server, and type in server's (NOT local! unless on LAN) IP address.

To play on Quest 2: if using link cable or virtual desktop, nothing special is needed. If running standalone, install .apk via sidequest, then join some server (standalone quest cannot host a server- but even a small laptop should be able to for you to play single player).

Any questions/thoughts/feedback? Check out the Discord!
